title: Timeless Polki Diamond Dangler Earrings - Royal Telugu Vaari
materials: Accent Diamonds. Features a traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: A captivating floral cluster at the top, cascading into a teardrop frame intricately embellished with uncut Polki diamonds. The centerpiece is a large, uniquely cut triangular Polki diamond set within a delicate lattice design. The openwork allows light to reflect beautifully, enhancing the diamonds' natural brilliance. The design has a modern take on the jhumka's silhouette.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions. Also suitable for contemporary events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: Experience the allure of traditional Telugu craftsmanship with this exquisitely designed Polki diamond earring. The uncut diamonds exude a timeless charm, complemented by the rich gold finish. A statement piece that blends heritage and modern aesthetics, adding a touch of regal sophistication to any ensemble.
